radiographic_examinations.findings: Hypointense T1-weighted and hyperintense T2-weighted bone marrow signal involving vertebral bodies T2, T3, and T4; vertebral compression fractures; an epidural fluid collection; and spinal cord compression.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A chest CT obtained before discharge showed a reduction in the size of the lung cavity.
